Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Numerous people have taken to social media to share excitement about the upcoming budget in Australia. Many labor party members and supporters have shared posts highlighting how the budget is set to benefit the most vulnerable members of society particularly single-parent households. There has been extensive promotion of an expanded extension of the Parenting Payment program which now includes financial assistance for families with dependents up to the age of 14. Others are heralding the budget as an effort to manage the economy responsibly while investing in a brighter future. Finally some posts suggest that this budget will correct for some of the problems caused by previous administrations.
